alert.note: Alert for Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 8:59AM CDT until March 26 at 2:23PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Poteau River near Panama affecting Le Flore County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Poteau River near Panama. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, minor agricultural flooding occurs. Williams Road east of Panama is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Friday the stage was 23.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 32.0 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
